page.title: 05EDUCATION - SECONDARY II
page.content:
{ Magherafelt College of Further {Education,}known locally as "The Tech" was founded in 1908.The principal is Mr. G. Byrne.The college caters for students of 16 years and over, providing them with suitable education in preparation for work in industry and commerce.
{Magherafelt High School}is a controlled secondary school with about 650 pupils on rolls.The school which opened in 1956 prepares pupils for C.S.E and G.C.E examinations.The headmaster is Mr. J.T.Brewster.
{St. Pius X High School }is a Roman Catholic maintained secondary school with 760 pupils on roll.The headmaster is Mr. O.J. O'Kane.Pupils study for C.S.E and G.C.E. examinations.
